info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 25 at 3:35AM CDT until July 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Dodge City KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...
South Fork Ninnescah River near Pratt affecting Pratt County.
For the SF Ninnescah River...including Pratt...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...South Fork Ninnescah River near Pratt.
* WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect overflow of banks. Stream overflows narrowly on the left bank and more broadly on the right bank. Stream is approximately 260 ft wide at this stage.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.1 feet on 10/04/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 345 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING
